scripts.build: rm -rf extension-dist && tsc && cp manifest.json extension-dist/manifest.json && if [ -d icons ]; then mkdir -p extension-dist/icons && cp icons/* extension-dist/icons/; fi && if [ -d _locales ]; then cp -R _locales extension-dist/; fi
scripts.pack: pnpm run build && cd extension-dist && zip -r ../gitary-companion.zip .
